description: This file demonstrates the usage of the Agno MCP integration with Graphiti to build a personal diary assistant. It defines an asynchronous function to run an agent that interacts with a knowledge graph and OpenAI models, and executes sample interactions to add diary entries and answer questions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with tools and models to perform tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: A tool class for interacting with MCP server via SSE.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that initializes MCPTools, creates an Agent, and runs it with a given message.
